title: In any Redevelopment project where the existing or proposed Co-operative Housing Society / Apartment
clause_text: In any Redevelopment project where the existing or proposed Co-operative Housing Society / Apartment Owners‘ Association / Developer appointed by the concerned Society / Association has obtained No Objection Certificate from the CIDCO, thereby securing additional balance FSI with the consent of 70% of its members and where such
